t:
The parents rushed inside her bedroom hearing their daughter scream. They found the room empty and the window open.



As they rushed outside frantically looking for their daughter,
I chuckled from the closet holding the child's lifeless body in my arms.
c:
I was a little surprised when the parents locked the doors and windows from outside. I watched in horror as the dead girl opened her eyes.



#daughter #scream #bedroom #intruder #murder #parents #window #search
